title: Virtual Currency Earned
description: Fired when a player earns virtual currency in a game.

currencyName.description: Name of the virtual currency, e.g. 'coins', 'gems', 'gold'.

source.description: How the virtual currency was earned.

balance.description: Player's total balance of this currency after earning.

level.description: Player's current level when the currency was earned.

gameMode.description: The game mode in which the currency was earned.
